original_text: And the crown shall be in the temple of the Lord as a reminder to Helem, Tobijah, Jedaiah, and Hen the son of Zephaniah.
korean_text: 그 면류관은 헬렘과 도비야와 여다야와 스바냐의 아들 헨을 기념하기 위하여 여호와의 전 안에 두라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And the crown shall be in the temple of the Lord
as a reminder to Helem, Tobijah, and Jedaiah
and to Hen the son of Zephaniah
